data.title: The Top Corporate Crime Cases Of 2024 So Far
data.meta_description: The partial acquittal of two retired British executives on bribery charges as part of a major Serious Fraud Office investigation, the first bribery conviction of a foreign official and Julian Assange's shock plea deal are just a few of the blockbuster cases so far in 2024.
